title: Electron Application Packaging Target
description: Electron application packaging target options for Build Facade

name.description: The name of the electron application.
name.x-prompt: What's the name the of electron application you would like to package? (backend)

frontendProject.description: Frontend project that needs to access this application.
frontendProject.x-prompt: What's the name the frontend application you would like to package?

sourcePath.description: The full path for the compiled source directory, relative to the current workspace. If this parameter is not supplied, the 'sourcePath' path from angular.json will be used.

outputPath.description: The full path for the new output directory, relative to the current workspace. If this parameter is not supplied, the 'outputPath' path from angular.json will be used.
